00005 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00006 // OS/Compiler Detect: SDK Build
00007 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 
00009 #ifdef DOXYGEN_INVOKED
00010 
00019     #define COREDATA_OS_WIN32 
00020     #define COREDATA_OS_LINUX 
00021     #define COREDATA_OS_MAC   
00022 
00023 #else
00024 // Detect OS
00025 #if !defined(SAG_COM) && (defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(__NT__))
00026     #define COREDATA_OS_WIN32
00027 #elif defined(__MWERKS__) && defined(__INTEL__)
00028     #define COREDATA_OS_WIN32
00029 #elif defined(linux) || defined(__linux) || defined(__linux__)
00030     #define COREDATA_OS_LINUX
00031 #elif (defined(macintosh) || defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__APPLE_CC__))
00032     #define COREDATA_OS_MAC
00033 #endif
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #ifdef DOXYGEN_INVOKED
00037 
00047     #define COREDATA_CC_INTEL
00048     #define COREDATA_CC_MSVC  
00049     #define COREDATA_CC_GNU   
00050 
00051 #else
00052 // Detect Compiler
00053 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00054     #define COREDATA_CC_MSVC
00055 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00056     #define COREDATA_CC_GNU
00057 #elif defined(__INTEL_COMPILER)
00058     #define COREDATA_CC_INTEL
00059 #endif
00060 #endif
00061 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 
00063 
00064 // Define all the possible types of WIN32 used by various win32 compilers
00065 #ifdef COREDATA_OS_WIN32
00066     #ifndef __WIN32__
00067         #define __WIN32__
00068     #endif
00069     #ifndef WIN32
00070         #define WIN32
00071     #endif
00072     #ifndef _WIN32
00073         #define _WIN32
00074     #endif
00075 #endif
00076 
00077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 // OS/Compiler Detect: special case for cygwin (emulate Linux for SDK builds)
00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 #if defined(__CYGWIN__)
00081     #undef COREDATA_OS_WIN32
00082     #ifndef COREDATA_OS_LINUX
00083         #define COREDATA_OS_LINUX
00084     #endif
00085     // Cygwin does not include this function (used in serialport)
00086     #define cfmakeraw(x)
00087 #endif // __CYGWIN__
00088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 
00090 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 // Compiler flag checks
00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 #if defined(COREDATA_CC_MSVC)
00094     #define NOMINMAX
00095     #define VC_EXTRA_LEAN
00096     #define WIN32_MEAN_AND_LEAN
00097     // Compiler violates std::9.4.2/4
00098     #define COREDATA_NO_INCLASS_MEMBER_INITIALIZATION_DEFINITION
00099 
00100     #if (_MSC_VER >= 1400)
00101         // warning about throw specs not being inforced (yet)
00102         #pragma warning(disable : 4290) // C++ exception specification ignored except to indicate a function is not __declspec(nothrow)
00103         // boost triggers these
00104         #pragma warning(disable : 4701) // Potentially uninitialized local variable 'name' used
00105         // Exporting a class that contains a datamember of STL type.
00106         #pragma warning(disable : 4251) // class 'some STL type' needs to have dll-interface to be used by clients of class 'classname'
00107         // controls STL iterator debugging options in VC8
00108         #ifdef _DEBUG
00109             #define _HAS_ITERATOR_DEBUGGING 1
00110         #endif
00111         #ifndef _SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
00112             // Disable message such as warning C4996: 'std::equal': Function call with parameters that may be unsafe - this call relies on the caller to check that the passed values are correct. To disable this warning, use -D_SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS. See documentation on how to use Visual C++ 'Checked Iterators'
00113             #define _SCL_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
00114         #endif
00115     #endif
00116 
00117     // Disable level 4 warnings that are too frequent to be useful
00118     #pragma warning(disable : 4100) // 'identifier' : unreferenced formal parameter
00119     #pragma warning(disable : 4127) // conditional expression is constant
00120     #pragma warning(disable : 4505) // 'function' : unreferenced local function has been removed
00121     #pragma warning(disable : 4511) // 'class' : copy constructor could not be generated
00122     #pragma warning(disable : 4512) // 'class' : assignment operator could not be generated
00123     #pragma warning(disable : 4516) // 'class::symbol' : access-declarations are deprecated; member using-declarations provide a better alternative
00124     #pragma warning(disable : 4702) // unreachable code
00125 
00126     // Check that exception handling compiler option is ON
00127     #if (!defined(_CPPUNWIND))
00128         #error "Exception handling compiler option must be enabled (/GX)"
00129     #endif
00130     #if (!defined(_DLL))
00131         // Check memory model is multi-threaded DLL
00132         #error "Code generation setting must use Multithreaded DLL runtime library"
00133     #endif
00134     #if (_MSC_VER < 1300)
00135         // Disable debug symbol too long warning for compiler ver < 7.0
00136         #pragma warning(disable : 4786)
00137     #endif
00138 #endif
00139 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00140 
00141 // Macros for compiler dependent code
00142 #ifdef COREDATA_OS_WIN32
00143     #define WINDOWS_ONLY(x) x
00144     #define LINUX_ONLY(x)
00145 #elif defined(COREDATA_OS_LINUX) || defined(COREDATA_OS_MAC)
00146     #define WINDOWS_ONLY(x) 
00147     #define LINUX_ONLY(x) x
00148 #else
00149     #error "Only Windows, Linux, and Mac builds are supported!"
00150 #endif // OS Specific

00168 #if defined(COREDATA_CC_MSVC) && _MSC_VER >= 1400
00169 // 1400 is VC8
00170 #   define COREDATA_DEPRECATED(text_message) __declspec(deprecated(text_message))
00171 #elif defined(COREDATA_CC_GNU) 
00172 #   define COREDATA_DEPRECATED(text_message) __attribute__ ((deprecated))
00173 #else
00174 #define COREDATA_DEPRECATED(text_message)

00184 #define COREDATA_DECLARE_NAMED_OBJECT_ID(constant_name, value) \
00185     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(ObjectID, constant_name = value)

00195 #   define COREDATA_DEFINE_NAMED_OBJECT_ID(fully_qualified_class_name, constant_name) \
00196         const ::sm::eod::Serializable::ObjectID fully_qualified_class_name::constant_name
